{"id":768159282,"lang":"cpp","time":"2 weeks, 3 days","timestamp":1659938038,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"4 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/768159282/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Happy Number","memory":"5.9 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int getNext(int n){\n        int sum =0 ;\n        while(n>0){\n            int r = n%10;\n            sum +=(r*r);\n            n = n/10;\n        }\n        return sum ;\n    }\n    bool isHappy(int n) {\n        int slow = getNext(n);\n        int fast = getNext(getNext(n));\n        while(slow!=fast && fast!=1){\n            slow = getNext(slow);\n            fast = getNext(getNext(fast));\n        }\n        return fast == 1;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"happy-number"}
